messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] quote from principal's speech
messages.msgSnippet: That reminds me a quote: In school you get the lesson and then take the test.  In life you take the test and then get the lesson. Bonjour Owl If you use the
messages.messageBody:
That reminds me a quote:
"In school you get the lesson and then take the test. In life you take
the test and then get the lesson."
Bonjour Owl
If you use the life method, you become a life long learner. If you use
the school method... ;-)
Lucie

tumile@... wrote:

>Excerpt from our local public high school principal's speech at graduation last week: "The exciting thing about your life now is that there is no core curriculum. High school is something you complete. Life is something you experience."
>Hmmmmmmmm.........
>
>Diane

messages.subject: quote from principal's speech
messages.msgSnippet: Excerpt from our local public high school principal s speech at graduation last week:  The exciting thing about your life now is that there is no core
messages.messageBody:
Excerpt from our local public high school principal's speech at graduation last week: "The exciting thing about your life now is that there is no core curriculum. High school is something you complete. Life is something you experience."
Hmmmmmmmm.........

Diane
